attributes.action: Stop the government spending taxpayer money to rebrand the PM’s official plane
attributes.additional_details: Consider that the colour and branding of the PM’s official plane is irrelevant compared to funding social care, especially at this time of coronavirus.
attributes.background: Consider that this money is desperately needed for other important things, like providing funding for those who are hungry or are homeless.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

You might like to sign some of these petitions, about issues you mention, instead:

Require housing for all homeless people after the coronavirus crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311860

We would like the government to consider social care as equally important to NHS: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302897
